description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 4 different modes to battle with friends. Sink, loot and beat them to see who is the real pirate! BattleShip Arcade is for playing with friends and family up to 4 on the same screen!
